info.name: KushnirNatalia_Public SOAP APIs
info.description: This is a collection of different SOAP APIs that are completley public and do not require any authentication, making it easier for consumers to play with and understand what APIs are all about by seeing the many different ways in which APIs can be used.

item.name: Calculator

item.name: Division of the big integers

exec: pm.test("Division of the big integers", function () {

item.name: Division of the value greater than 2147483647 (int type)

exec: pm.test("Division of the value greater than 2147483647 (int type)", function () {
pm.expect(jsonObject['soap:Envelope'] ['soap:Body'] ['DivideResponse'] ['DivideResult']).to.eql('Error 400: the system supports only numbers in the range -2147483648, +2147483647');

item.name: Division of the float numbers

exec: pm.test("Division of the float numbers", function () {
